Parallels.ab: zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe iδa aṣ̌aōnō aṣ̌īmca frauuaṣ̌īmca yazamaide = Y6.19, Y10.21, Y13.7, Y26.4; ~ Y4.24, Y24.5 āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e; ~ Y3.2, Y3.22, Y3.23, Y7.3, Y7.23, Y7.24 xšnūmaine zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌əe; ~ Y68.30, NyMihr1.6, NyXwar1.6 nəmō zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e.
vīspā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō aṣ̌āunąm yazamaide = Y26.10, VrS30.10.
ādax́iiunąmca aṣ̌aōnąm frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide uzdax́iiunąmca aṣ̌aōnąm frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide = Y26.8.

narąm aṣ̌aōnąm frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide nāirinąm aṣ̌aōninąm frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide = Y26.9; ~ Y26.7 vīspanąm narąm aṣ̌aōnąm frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide vīspanąm nāirinąm aṣ̌aōninąm frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide. Cf. Yt13.143-145.
